p: The TDRM and ADRM were identified using the Calibrated Population Resistance (CPR) tool [ 27] ( http://cpr.stanford.edu/cpr.cgi) and the Genotypic Resistance Interpretation Algorithm of the HIVdb program [ 28] ( http://sierra2.stanford.edu/sierra/servlet/JSierra), respectively, both available through the Stanford University HIV Drug Resistance Database. The HIVdb program was also used to infer the resistance profile of the HIV-1 sequences.
